Hymn.Arabic: مباركٌ الآتى بإسمِ الربِّ . باَركناكم من بيتِ الربِّ .أنتَ هو إلهى فأشكُرَكَ . إلهى أنت فَأَرفَعُكَ
Hymn.English: Blessed is He who comes in the name of The Lord. We have blessed you out of the house of the Lord. You are my God, and I will give You thanks. You are my God, I will exalt You.
